Transcription for 1002366

I wish to wish you all a very happy St. David's Day.
Welsh people from all over the world at this time of the year are celebrating St. David's Day.
This is 1,400 years ago, St. David died on March the 1st, and we are commemorating that today.
Today we will celebrate by remembering how our parents or grandparents came to the Seattle area in poetry, words, and music.
As part of our celebrating our state centennial.
We will now have, Martha are you here?
Okay. Looking for you and I can't see you.
You want to give your words of welcome please.
